text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Isn't Coronavirus a hoax???? I'm no social distancing and I'm definitely not going to my business. It's an essential service for me. If Donald Trump says my kids can go back to scholl then Fuck the School board. I'll drop them off at the front door at, 9 am tomorrow
